description: Display the details about a cluster. The response includes the cluster name, endpoints, status, and Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterEndpoints
nested_items.description: Endpoints for a cluster. Specify one of these endpoints when you want to set or retrieve a routing control state in the cluster.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: A cluster endpoint. Specify an endpoint and Amazon Web Services Region when you want to set or retrieve a routing control state in the cluster.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region for a cluster endpoint.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Deployment status of a resource. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the cluster owner.

nested_items.name: NetworkType
nested_items.description: The network type of the cluster. NetworkType can be one of the following: IPV4, DUALSTACK.
